General.Name: Temapol Polimer Plastik ve Insaat Sanayi Ticaret AS
General.Description: Temapol Polimer Plastik ve Insaat Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells thermoplastic sheets in Turkey and internationally. Its products are used in furniture, sanitary ware, automotive and vehicle, white goods, advertisement, and medical and sanitary industries. The company also offers temaglass and high gloss acrylic sheets. Temapol Polimer Plastik ve Insaat Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.
General.Address: Mimarsinan Org. San. BOel Mahallesi 5., Kayseri, Turkey, 38260
